alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 3:50PM EDT until April 07 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... Northern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galivants Ferry, or 13 miles south of Mullins, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Loris, Bethel, Galivants Ferry, Nakina, Mollie, Bughill, Sidney, Clarendon, Williams, Pireway, Dulah, Goretown, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Brunswick, Aynor and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
